noOngoingMonth: There is no ongoing month for this user. Please go to the budget and set a budget.
appDescription: This app uses AI to empower you to reach your financial goals.
coach1Description: Meet Alex. He knows the struggles of starting from scratch and is passionate about helping beginners pave their way in the financial world. Think of him as your personal cheerleader.
coach2Description: Say hi to Jane. She's the genius when it comes to advanced financial maneuvers. If you're looking to dive deep and master your finances, Jane's your coach.
coach3Description: Here's Sam. He's got an eagle eye for investments and loves to help others grow their wealth over time. Ready to play the long game? Sam's got you covered.
coach4Description: Introducing Lily. She's the queen of budgeting. Whether you're saving for a rainy day or planning a big purchase, Lily's advice is gold.
tellUsMore: Tell us more about you, so we can optimize your first budget.
